ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] IIRC (OT) then Pixie (OnT) then Formula 1 (OT again)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeppers...I now remember it does..however, If I recall can be substituted in ALL situations I have come across, as that is how I always read it LOL ...
ygData.messageBody:
>
Yeppers...I now remember it does..however, "If I recall" can be
substituted in ALL situations I have come across, as that is how I always
read it LOL
>

Very true. :)

You'll have to forgive me. It's been a *painfully* slow Friday. I got
level 29 last night after a wonderful few hours in Mistmoore and I'm itching
to go back and make sure it wasn't a fluke. ;)

Bringing this back OnT, I was, if you'll pardon the self pat on the back,
absolutely rocking last night doing crowd control. Our Warrior pulled six
initiates/pledges, two of which were casters. I hurriedly let the group
('group' hah! Me, the warrior and a mage) know what I was doing: charmed
one caster and sic her on the other and kept the three male initiates
mezzed.

Not one resist the whole time. I took a bit of a beating as I mis-timed
some of the wake-ups, but overall I was very happy. Which leads me to my
question... at 28/29, Pixie Strike has been working very well. At what
point does it start to degenerate into the realms of uselessness, or is it a
gradual thing?

Back OT: The weekend's looking pretty good now... just got offered tickets
for the first US F1 Grand Prix in Indianapolis!
